PHRASE.LANG:
The Sweetest of the Peeps packaged together for the Sugar and Spice Peep Pack. Sweetie Peep, Lil' Snow Peep and Sunshine Peep come packaged as Heavy Pets, Companions and Mini-Peeps! Nine fantastic treats in one big bundle! Colors as shown.
This set includes the following items.


・Sweetie Peep - Vavoom Violet
 ・Sweetie Peep - Static Mini - Vavoom Violet
 ・Sweetie Peep - Heavy Pet - Vavoom Violet
 ・Lil' Snow Peep - Powder Pink
 ・Lil' Snow Peep - Static Mini - Powder Pink
 ・Lil' Snow Peep - Heavy Pet - Powder Pink
 ・Sunshine Peep - Summer Rain
 ・Sunshine Peep - Static Mini - Summer Rain
 ・Sunshine Peep - Heavy Pet - Summer Rain


※ All of the above items will become available in their relevant categories on purchasing this bundle. [#Legal]

Le plus alléchant des Peeps groupes pour Sugar and Spice Peep Package. Sweetie Peep, Lil'Snow Peep et Sunshine Peep viennent emballes comme Heavy Pets, Compagnons et Mini-Peeps! Neuf gâteries en une grande panoplie! Couleurs comme montrées.[#Legal]

Das Knuddeligste der Peeps kommt zu dir im Sugar and Spice Peep Paket. Sweetie Peep, Lil' Snow Peep und Sunshine Peep sind verpackt als Heavy Pets, Freundschafts- und Mini Peeps zu haben! Neun fantastische Figuren in einem Bündel! Farben wie abgebildet.[#Legal]

I piú dolci dei Peeps impachettati insieme nel Pachetto Sugar and Spice Peep Pack. Sweetie Peep, Lil' Snow Peep e Sunshine Peep vengono impachettati come Heavy Pets, Companions e Mini-Peeps! Nove fantastiche sorprese in un unico pachetto! Colori come da mostra.[#Legal]

Los Peeps mas tiernos empacados juntos en el Paquete Sugar and Spice Peep Pack. Sweetie Peep, Lil' Snow Peep y Sunshine Peep estan empacados como Heavy Pets, Companions y Mini-Peeps! Nueve fantásticos regalos en un paquete único! Colores como la muestra.[#Legal]

가장 사랑스런 Peep 패키지가 Sugar and Spice Peep 팩에 함께 들어있습니다. Sweetie Peep, Lil' Snow Peep, Sunshine Peep을 Heavy Pet, 컴패니언, Mini-Peep 패키지로 만나실 수 있습니다! 하나의 번들로 9개의 환상적인 조합! 색상은 나타난 바와 같습니다.
본 세트에는 하기 아이템이 포함되어 있습니다. 


●Sweetie Peep - 환희의 바이올렛
 ●Sweetie Peep - Static Mini - 환희의 바이올렛
 ●Sweetie Peep - Heavy Pet - 환희의 바이올렛
 ●Lil' Snow Peep - 파우더 핑크
 ●Lil' Snow Peep - Static Mini - 파우더 핑크
 ●Lil' Snow Peep - Heavy Pet - 파우더 핑크
 ●Sunshine Peep - 여름비
 ●Sunshine Peep - Static Mini - 여름비
 ●Sunshine Peep - Heavy Pet - 여름비


※ 상기 모든 아이템들은 이 번들 구입과 동시에 적절한 카테고리에서 이용할 수 있습니다. [#Legal]

最甜美的Peep女士們盡在甜美Peep組合包。組合包中的Sweetie Peep、Lil' Snow Peep和Sunshine Peep分別擁有三種型態：Heavy Pets、隨身夥伴s和Mini-Peeps！一個組合包，給您九種驚喜！顏色如圖所示。本組合包含以下商品：


●Sweetie Peep - 極光紫
 ●Sweetie Peep 靜態迷你公仔 - 極光紫
 ●Sweetie Peep - Heavy Pet - 極光紫
 ●Lil' Snow Peep - 桃粉紅
 ●Lil' Snow Peep 靜態迷你公仔 - 桃粉紅
 ●Lil' Snow Peep - Heavy Pet - 桃粉紅
 ●Sunshine Peep - 梅雨季
 ●Sunshine Peep 靜態迷你公仔 - 梅雨季
 ●Sunshine Peep - Heavy Pet - 梅雨季


※ 購買組合包後，以上所有物品都會加入相關的類別中。[#Legal]
